description: This file defines the SyncService class, which provides hooks for backend synchronization within the app. Currently, it implements a no-op sync method that updates the last sync timestamp.

classes.name: SyncService
classes.description: Provides hooks for backend synchronization with a simple implementation updating the last sync time.

methods.name: syncNow
methods.description: Performs a synchronization with the backend; currently a placeholder that updates the last sync timestamp.

methods.name: lastSync
methods.description: Getter that returns the timestamp of the last successful sync.
